44 (extended) | duration = | event = | characters = | previous = [[Parth Galen (scene)|Parth Galen]] | next = [[The Departure of Boromir (scene)|The Departure of Boromir]] }} '''The Breaking of the Fellowship''' is the thirty-eighth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and the forty-fourth of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition. [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring scenes|44]]
